ctx: intros u v u' v' Hcolineaire Hortho Hortho'.
exceptions.tactic: apply (orthogonal_sym u u' Hortho) in Hortho'.
exceptions.exn: In environment u, v, u', v' : V Hcolineaire : colineaire u u' Hortho : orthogonal u v Hortho' : orthogonal u' v' The term "u" has type "V" while it is expected to have type "orthogonal ?u ?v".

original: intros u v u' v' Hcolineaire Hortho Hortho'. apply (orthogonal_sym u u' Hortho) in Hortho'.
